title: Fr. John Corapi---The Catholic Church
description:
* If you don't want to download this, then don't.
* Nobody is forcing religion on you.
* If you're not interested in Catholicism, then please move along, nothing to see here.
* If you are Catholic, I apologize in advance for any rude comments that some may leave here.

This series is a direct response to the terrible scandals that have rocked the Catholic Church in recent years. Touching on such essential themes as the Church as the Bride of Christ, Mary as Mother of the Church, and the Eucharist as the source, center, and summit of the Church's life, this series helps the faithful regain a more balanced and honest view of the Church.

Part 1: The Church-Body and Bride of Christ
Part 2: The Priesthood: Sacrifice, Service, Crucifixion
Part 3: Eucharist-Source and Summit of the Church's Life
Part 4: Mary-Mother of the Church
Part 5: Peter-The Pope in Christ the Rock
Part 6: Scandals! - Attack on the Catholic Church

* Please seed, I can only seed these a short time due to bandwidth caps.
